entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
